players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I am Diana, and I investigated Charlie last night — Charlie is the mafioso. We need to vote to arrest Charlie now."
Charlie: "That's impossible — Diana, you're lying or mistaken. I was with Bob last night; ask him where I was."

You: "I was at home alone last night and didn't see Charlie. Diana, why would you accuse Charlie so quickly? Can you share what time you investigated and any details? Charlie, can anyone confirm your alibi besides you?"

Charlie: "I didn't kill Alice — Diana's claim is extreme and smells like a self-claim to gain power. Diana, why reveal an investigation immediately instead of quietly sharing results later? Bob couldn't confirm my alibi because he said he was alone; Bob, can you explain why you said you were alone if Charlie supposedly was with you? Town should be careful rushing to arrest without stronger proof."

You: "I don't trust quick accusations without proof. Diana, when exactly did you investigate Charlie and what did you see? Charlie, your alibi is weak — saying you were with me is testable: I was alone. We need specifics, not accusations. Let's vote only if answers are clear."
Diana: "I investigated Charlie at around midnight and confirmed they're the mafioso. Alice was killed last night — we need to arrest Charlie now."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
